description:
Reception Room Furniture & Waiting Area Chairs suitable for all environments and commercial applications. Create a stand out bespoke reception or waiting area with our chairs, benches and cube seating. We have selected a range that is manufactured to provide exceptional standards of quality, durability and practicality. We offer chairs with:
  • wooden frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • wooden frames with wooden seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with polypropylene or wooden seat & backrests,
  • polypropylene chairs,
  • rattan chairs,
  • metal chairs and
  • office chairs.
All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: Reception & Waiting Room Seating
